home.sub_title: Technologist in Big Data in Agribusiness
home.description: Hello, welcome to my web site, my name is Lucas de Brito Silva and I am {{idade}} years old. I consider myself an enthusiast in Technology and I am motivated by my dreams, in which to realize them, I sought to train myself with the formation in the course Computer Technician at ETEC Professor Massuyuki Kawano, I took the course of Big Data in Agribusiness (being of the first class to graduate in Brazil), besides, currently I am doing Masters in Computer Science. I hope you enjoy browsing my website, shall we?
